replies.body:
A leveling won't happen unless Keenan changes his mind.
If you've heard or prestiges, that is a leveling system that Avicus used to have that everyone loved, it got taken away and quite a few people quit Avicus because it got boring and now Keenan keeps on saying that he won't re-implement it regardless of what the community wants.
replies.body_tagged:
A leveling won't happen unless Keenan changes his mind.
If you've heard or prestiges, that is a leveling system that Avicus used to have that everyone loved, it got taken away and quite a few people quit Avicus because it got boring and now Keenan keeps on saying that he won't re-implement it regardless of what the community wants.

reply_to.body: well hmm, if you guys are willing to make a leveling system which give support credits every level, it could just five you experience?
reply_to.body_tagged: well hmm, if you guys are willing to make a leveling system which give support credits every level, it could just five you experience?

replies.body:
if you guys are willing to make a leveling system which give support credits every level

If Keenan was open to it, sure. The response I've gotten for the reason it's not being added back is because it is too difficult to create new levels every time someone reaches the highest level. I asked if it was possible to just have infinite levels, and they don't know. I'm not sure if this is a possibility but I like the idea. Either way, let's try to think of some ideas that would work now. 

While typing this I had an idea: What if each achievement you got was a badge, or a badge color. And it would go into your backpack, and you could use it whenever you would like. It would advertise the forums, as well as give players a reason to look on the forums, and be active.
replies.body_tagged:
if you guys are willing to make a leveling system which give support credits every level

If Keenan was open to it, sure. The response I've gotten for the reason it's not being added back is because it is too difficult to create new levels every time someone reaches the highest level. I asked if it was possible to just have infinite levels, and they don't know. I'm not sure if this is a possibility but I like the idea. Either way, let's try to think of some ideas that would work now. 

While typing this I had an idea: What if each achievement you got was a badge, or a badge color. And it would go into your backpack, and you could use it whenever you would like. It would advertise the forums, as well as give players a reason to look on the forums, and be active.

replies.body:
Eh, tbh increasing credits wouldn't work, as it looks like the Admins are trying to increase what you get by donating. Removig credits pretty much kills the rest of the donor ranks as you don't get much anyhow.

Prestiges were always the best, it gave a personal goal, and would also get a lot of the server to compete to see who can get to the highest prestige. If unlimited prestiges happen, I guess it can go for who can sustain the highest prestige.
replies.body_tagged:
Eh, tbh increasing credits wouldn't work, as it looks like the Admins are trying to increase what you get by donating. Removig credits pretty much kills the rest of the donor ranks as you don't get much anyhow.

Prestiges were always the best, it gave a personal goal, and would also get a lot of the server to compete to see who can get to the highest prestige. If unlimited prestiges happen, I guess it can go for who can sustain the highest prestige.
